text: hello everyone thanks for having me this

observability and

covers are the following observability

ql instrumentation and

under the

what use it for

be
used additionally Prometheus remote

alerting and
dashboarding open source tools like

intuitive visualizations of different

monitored grafana makes it feasible to

metrics as graphical representation and
to create custom
dashboards monting is often purred with
alerting tools that notify engineers
when metrics have exceeded or Fallen

also it gives ways to filter alert
before sending
notifications so what happens after
taking the
exam the results of the exam will be
